IsControllableShotAngle.description: Allows the player to manually rotate the cannon.

OutOfControl.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player.

KeepVelocityDistance.description: Distance before restoring gravity to Sonic. If set too high, gravity will be disabled until hitting another spring or object

IsWallWalk.description: Enables wall running if the player launches into a wall

Extra.name: An unfinished object which launches the player after pressing A. The object is functional, and the parameters work correctly, but Sonic doesn't enter the cannon properly.
